column4: Hi, I REALLY need help dpkg-reconfiguring my xserver-xorg on my laptop which uses the Intel 855GM.  It was working like a charm before but I think I messed up x-server by mis-configuring it.  Now, it is giving me the "Fatal server error: no screens found.  XIO: fatgal IO error 104"
boot up recovery mode and run  sudo dpkg-reconfigure xorg.conf   if you haven'T done it already
hey, I "think" (after trying to dpkg-reconfgure it so many times") that I must have entered the so called "bus-specfic format" wrong.  Cuz the message I got was the "no screens found" error
that was the most I could offer,
i'm not in recovery mode, should it make a difference if I dpkg-reconfigure it in recovery mode instead?
I sugested the recovery mode because  thought that you couldn't get X running
